title.text: Security Update for Report Viewer Redistributable 2008 Service Pack 1 (KB971119)

description.text: A security issue has been identified that could allow an attacker to compromise your Windows-based system with the Report Viewer Redistributable 2008 Service Pack 1 and gain complete control over it. You can help protect your computer by installing this update from Microsoft. After you install this item, you may have to restart your computer.
